entry.title: $2675 // 1 Bdrm Chelsea Apartment, Available Sept 1, 2675/mo.
entry.content:
Chelsea apartment with exposed brick and lots of storage space. It is a 1 bdrm, 1 bthrm apartment, with a 2nd room that can be used as a bedroom or living space.

I have been sharing this apartment with my husband for 4 years. We are only breaking our lease because I am going back to school on the west coast. The new tenant will be asked to sign a new 1 year lease with the property management company.

We would be willing to sell our furniture for cheap to the new tenant and will be leaving our air conditioning unit.

Short walk to the Highline and Chelsea Piers, amazing restaurants, and Chelsea Market, + easy commute uptown or downtown (ACE/123/FM).

The rent is $2675/mo., 1 month's rent security deposit. Heat and gas are included. $100 for credit check fee applies. Move-in date September 1.

entry.title: $2700 // Chelsea 1 Bedroom Apartment at 16th Street & 7th Ave - Renovated!
entry.content:
Great 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment. Newly renovated, new appliances brand new floors.
Very close to many subways- A,C,E,L,1,2,3,F,M all within 2 blocks.
Flexible on start of lease, but no earlier than September 1st.
Laundry, live-in super, video intercom. Apartment is occupied, email for private viewing
